oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tyler. Jessie Potter Tyler and Hugh Tyler, 1922.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Jessie Potter Tyler (1856-1929), Mother Superior of the Tabernacle, an order of Episcopal nuns in Chattanooga, with nephew Hugh Tyler. 1922. From the Hugh Tyler Album.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Families; Nuns; Eyeglasses;
